name: HopOnTop
description:
Fast paced, pvp, local multiplayer game where you try and hop on the other player's heads. 

I developed it as my semester project for university. I did everything other than the 2D pixel art and animations. Programming, game design, level design, project management, etc was all me. 

Base idea was from my love for local multiplayer games and I think all that I learned from making this will allow me in future to make some fun local multiplayer games for me to play with friends.
